body.p: The Board observed that the current guidance in IFRS 5 could be read in a way that a change from a plan to sell a non-current asset (or disposal group) to a plan to distribute a non-current asset (or disposal group) automatically results in a change to a plan of sale and that the guidance in paragraphs 27–29 of IFRS 5 should be applied.
